쉽고_빠르게_문서를_모델에_학습시키고_해당_문서에_대한_대화를_나눌_수_: Easily and quickly train documents to the model and have a conversation about the document.
Input_데이터와_Output_설정을_조정하여_정교한_커스텀챗봇을_만들: You can create a sophisticated custom chatbot by adjusting the Input data and Output settings.
한번에_여러가지_LLM_모델_성능을_시험하고_정답률을_비교할_수_있습니다: You can test the performance of various LLM models at once and compare the accuracy.
